solution_line_template: They spent ${cost_per_person_items} each on cheeseburgers and milkshakes because {cheeseburger_cost} + {milkshake_cost} = <<{cheeseburger_cost}+{milkshake_cost}={cost_per_person_items}>>{cost_per_person_items}

They spent ${total_cost_individual_items} on these items in total because {num_people} x {cost_per_person_items} = <<{num_people}*{cost_per_person_items}={total_cost_individual_items}>>{total_cost_individual_items}
They spent ${total_meal_cost} on their meal because {total_cost_individual_items} + {cheese_fries_cost} = <<{total_cost_individual_items}+{cheese_fries_cost}={total_meal_cost}>>{total_meal_cost}
